Key Match Events: Nathan Eovaldi remains perfect with a 4-0 record after pitching 6.1 innings, allowing 5 hits, 2 earned runs, 4 strikeouts, and 3 walks.
Mitch Garver hit a home run to right center in the 2nd inning.
Jonah Heim hit a home run to right in the 4th inning, scoring Mitch Garver.
Mauricio Dubón hit a sacrifice fly to right in the 6th inning, allowing Yordan Alvarez to score.
Mitch Garver doubled to left in the 8th inning, allowing Evan Carter to score.
Adolis García hit a home run to left in the 9th inning, scoring Leody Taveras, Marcus Semien, and Corey Seager.
